name: dataZoom.inside
desc: **dataZoomInside** Data zoom component of *inside* type. Refer to [dataZoom](https://echarts.apache.org/en/option.html#dataZoom) for more information. The *inside* means it's inside the coordinates. + Translation: data area can be translated when moving in coordinates. + Scaling: + PC: when mouse rolls (similar with touch pad) in coordinates. + Mobile: when touches and moved with two fingers in coordinates on touch screens.

name: dataZoom.slider
desc:
Slider type dataZoom component provides functions like data thumbnail, zoom, brush to select, drag to move, click to locate.

The followling picture shows areas to interact.

![600xauto](https://echarts.apache.org/en/option.html#dataZoom-zone.png)
